div.p: H75/8120, unit 813, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me, dear Mr. Odgers, to send you the enclosed part of the Ballarat Star of the 28 June.
Newspaper clipping reporting the Annual Meeting of the Ballarat Farmers' Club attached to file. Perhaps you are so kind to show Mr Ramsay, that his sending of the first part of the "educational collection" is acknowledged. Probably you have arranged already to send the second part. Of course also this work must be discontinued as not even the £30 for papers, past boards, which each parts cost, and which, on Mr. Ramsays suggestion, were taken in advance of this years vote some months ago, are refunded on the new estimates, besides there are no means for travelling provided, which mainly were carried out on my private expense during the last two and indeed many of the former years.
